name: Ifa
title: In the Wake of Wandering Winds
description: A vet from the Flower-Feather Clan who cherishes the life he leads alongside all manner of living things â€” people, animals, you name it.

normal.1: Performs up to 3 attacks, dealing <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and fires off a shot, dealing <anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</anemo>.

plunging.1: Plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents along the path. Deals <anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</anemo> upon impact with the ground.

description.0: It's time for the real bash bros to step up! Ifa calls Cacucu in as backup.
description.1: After using this skill, Ifa gains 80 Nightsoul points and enters the Nightsoul's Blessing state. In the Nightsoul's Blessing state, Ifa will hover with Cacucu's help. When he uses Normal Attacks in this state, he will use different kinds of Supporting Fire depending on whether you Tap or Hold, firing Tonicshots that are capable of healing all party members.
description.3: Additionally, Holding the Elemental Skill Airborne Disease Prevention while Ifa is in Nightsoul's Blessing will cause him to use a Nightsoul-aligned Plunging Attack. Letting go of the skill button will interrupt this Plunging Attack to maintain his hover. If Ifa lands due to this Plunging Attack, his Nightsoul's Blessing state will end.

description.0: Fires a Therapeutic Sedative at a (temporarily aggressive) opponent. The sedative will explode on impact, creating a restraining wind current that pulls nearby objects and opponents in while dealing Nightsoul-aligned <anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</anemo>.
description.1: When the Therapeutic Sedative hits an opponent affected by Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will apply a Sedation Mark to them.

description.0: When Ifa is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, every 1 Nightsoul point out of the total in his entire party will grant him 1 Rescue Essentials point. Rescue Essentials will increase the Swirl and Electro-Charged DMG dealt by all nearby party members.
When nearby party members trigger Nightsoul Bursts, Ifa's Elemental Mastery increases by 80 for 10s.

While in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, when the current active party member or indwelt saurian has less than 40% HP, Ifa will consume 10 Phlogiston and restore 40% of their HP. This effect can trigger once every 10s, and does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or the Spiral Abyss.
When Supporting Fire hits an opponent, it will restore 6 Energy for Ifa. One such Energy restoration can be triggered once every 8s.
When Ifa is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, every Nightsoul point the party has above a total of 60 will grant Ifa 4 additional Rescue Essentials points.
description.1: Additionally, Ifa's Rescue Essentials limit is increased by 50.
description.2: You must first unlock the Passive Talent Field Medic's Vision.

constellation3.name: Rebuttal in Negotiations With the Night

description.0: Increases the Level of Airborne Disease Prevention by 3.
The restraining wind current created by the Elemental Burst Compound Sedation Field has its duration extended to 3s.
description.1: Additionally, Ifa gains 100 Elemental Mastery for 15s after using his Elemental Burst Compound Sedation Field.

description.0: Increases the Level of Compound Sedation Field by 3.

When Ifa uses the Hold version of his Supporting Fire, there is a 50% chance that he will fire an additional Tonicshot that deals 120% of Ifa's ATK as Anemo DMG. This DMG is considered Normal Attack DMG.
description.1: Additionally, when he is not in combat, Ifa will consume 20% less Nightsoul points and Phlogiston in his Nightsoul's Blessing state.
